text:
The default rate limit for the DALL·E API depends which model you are using (DALL·E 2 vs DALL·E 3) along with your usage tier. For example, with DALL·E 3 and usage tier 3, you can generate 7 images per minute. 



Learn more in our [rate limits guide](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/rate-limits/usage-tiers). You can also check the specific limits for your account in your [limits page](https://platform.openai.com/account/limits).
title: What's the rate limit for the DALL·E API?
